backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping Valentine UI features to involved files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing brief summaries of key frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables and Valentine-themed palette.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app and mounting root element.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component rendering the ValentineProposalPage.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and managing authenticated or anonymous backend actors.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity auth context and provider handling login, identity persistence, and state.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Valentine-themed OKLCH color system and typography configuration for the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entry point setting up providers and rendering the App.
frontend/src/pages/ValentineProposalPage: Valentine proposal UI with shrinking No button, celebratory Yes message, and themed assets.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom color tokens, typography, container settings, animations, and extended theme values for a Valentineâ€‘styled UI.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata and requirements for building a Valentine proposal page featuring Yes/No interactions and themed design assets.
